section.name: Maven Cactus plugin
section.p: This is a plugin for Maven that allows to easily perform Cactus unit-testing with Maven. See the features list for more details.

tr.td:
Released development build of the Cactus plugin. It is equivalent the 3.2 version when the plugin was hosted in Maven land. To install it, run:
maven plugin:download -DartifactId=cactus-maven -DgroupId=cactus -Dversion=1.6dev-20031031
Read the using guide for more details on installation and usage.
This plugin was previously hosted in the Maven project itself. It has now moved to the Cactus project.

section.name: Documentation roadmap
